reqs:
This section of the course is PRINT-BASED - distance education. Your instructor and course support staff will contact you by email prior to and during the course. Please ensure you have a valid email account. Course materials must be ordered or picked up at the UBC Bookstore. More information can be found under Distance Learning at : http://ctlt.ubc.ca/
It is important to be sure that your distance course is eligible under the student loan program. For your reference: http://www.students.ubc.ca/finance/loans.cfm?page=courseloads.
Where applicable, please visit this site for examination information: http://www.students.ubc.ca/coursesreg/exams/
description: Introduction to the quantitative tools necessary in forest management. Available only through Distance Education.
